    • Method Detail

      • content

        IContent content(int id)
        Get a fully populated IContent instance matching the template id provided.
        Parameters:
        id - the content type id
        Returns:
        a matching IContent instance

      • message

        IMessage message()
        Get a clean new IMessage instance.
        Returns:
        an IMessage instance
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if a template message has not previousely been set using template(IMessage).
        See Also:
        template(IMessage)

      • messageList

        Get a clean new IMessageList instance.

      • template

        void template(IMessage message)
        Sets the message template used to create new messages in the current thread.
        Parameters:
        message - the message template to create new messages
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if another template has already been set for the current thread
        See Also:
        message()
